Package game.dinosaurs

Class Dinosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaurs.Dinosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface, Visitable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Allosaur, Brachiosaur, Pterodactyl, Stegosaur
public abstract class Dinosaur
extends Actor
implements Visitable
A dinosaur class that contains all the dinosaur logic. Its subclasses only handles the logic that are exclusive to the species. To implement any additional functionalities, or change current functionalities, extend this class and override the methods.

  • Field Details

    • rand

      protected static final java.util.Random rand
      Randomize gender for dinosaurs

    • dinoCounter

      protected static int dinoCounter
      Stores the total number of Dinosaurs that have been on the map. Used to generate unique ID for each Dinosaur.

    • actionFactories

      protected Behaviour[] actionFactories
      A list of Behaviours. Every turn, the list will be looped through and the Action decided by the Behaviours will be executed. Order matters, Behaviours with lower index in the list have higher priority.

    • dinoId

      protected final int dinoId
      Unique ID for Dinosaur

    • maxWaterLevel

      protected int maxWaterLevel
      Defines dinosaur's max water level capacity

    • waterLevel

      protected int waterLevel
      Keep tracks of dinosaur's current water level capacity

    • age

      protected int age
      Age of the Dinosaur. Direct representation of how many turns has passed since it's born.

    • turnsBeingPregnant

      protected int turnsBeingPregnant
      Number of turns the Dinosaur has been pregnant.

    • turnsBeingUnconscious

      protected int turnsBeingUnconscious
      Number of turns the Dinosaur has been unconscious.

  • Method Details

    • getValidFoods

      Returns:

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      During every turn, the dinosaur's age is incremented, and the if the age is higher or equal the adult growth stage, it will add a capability ADULT and change its display character to uppercase. Dinosaur will be labeled as fertile by adding capability FERTILE, if it fulfills the requirement to be fertile, else the fertile status is removed. If the dinosaur is pregnant, the turn of being pregnant is incremented, and if the turns being pregnant has reached a certain number, it will lay a dinosaur egg of its kind and remove the pregnant capability. The turns of being pregnant is also removed. Every turn, the dinosaur will also lose 1 hit point, if its hit point reaches 0, it will be unconscious, and the turns of being unconscious will be recorded and it will only do the do nothing action until the player feeds and heal the dinosaur or the turns of being unconscious reached a certain number and it dies. The dinosaur is then replace with its corpse. If the dinosaur's hit points are below a certain threshold, it will add the hungry capability else the removed. During every turn, the dinosaur will loop through a list of behaviours to behave which ever it meets the requirement first and the action returned from the behaviour is executed by the dinosaur. If there is no action returned from the list of behaviours, the dinosaur will do nothing.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      The action to be performed by the dinosaur this turn.

    • getAllowableActions

      public Actions getAllowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
      Allows actor to commit some actions when adjacent to the dinosaur. Player is able to heal this dinosaur when standing beside it, by looping through the player's inventory and if it can heal, it is added into the list of actions.
      Overrides:
      getAllowableActions in class Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      A list of executable actions to this dinosaur.

    • isHungry

      public abstract boolean isHungry()
      Abstract method for different dinosaurs to check if they are hungry.
      Returns:
      True if the hit points of dinosaur is below a certain integer. False otherwise.

      public boolean isThirsty()

      protected abstract boolean isAdult()

      Returns:

    • canBreed

      protected abstract boolean canBreed()
      Checks if the dinosaur has enough hit points to bread with other dinosaur.
      Returns:
      True if the hit points of dinosaur is above or equal a certain integer. False otherwise.
